descriptions.description: Termcap is a library and data base that enables programs to use display terminals in a terminal-independent manner.
Termcap ist eine Bibliothek und Datenbank, die es Programmen ermöglicht, Display-Terminals in einer Terminal-unabhängigen Weise zu nutzen.

set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=termcap PACKAGE_VERSION=1.3.1
oegextract termcap
oeg_include_files COPYING README
# The DESTDIR in "make install DESTDIR=" is ignored, all files go to the prefix directory. # But termcap is installed in /etc/termcap! This overwrites the termcap of MSYS, so # we do not use the --enable-install-termcap configure option and place it manually.
configure --prefix=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR} ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} make make install
mkdir ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}/etc cp termcap.src ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}/etc/termcap
cd ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR} oeg_fix_path_names oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
